      • Public Function GetRuleIds(ByVal lngCuboidId As Long, Optional blnAllRules As Boolean = False) As Collection

        Public Function GetRuleIds(ByVal lngCuboidId As Long, Optional blnAllRules As Boolean = False) As Collection
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : GetRuleIds
        '* Description : Returns collection of RuleIds set for lngCuboidId passed as parameter
        '* SCENARIO 1: User Mode : Need only Rules with IsActive = TRUE
        '* SCENARIO 2: Design Mode -> Apply Setting: Need only Rules with IsActive = TRUE
        '* SCENARIO 3: Design Mode -> Site Map : Need all Rules irrespective of TRUE/FALSE value blnAllRules=TRUE
        '* Created : 02-18-2013 13:46
        '* Modified: 02-18-2013 13:46
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
